attributes.action: Sack George Osborne For Destroying The Country
attributes.additional_details:
We have been brought into a depression and have been shown no way out of this and has only made it so that public sector is cut to fund the pockets of the private sector
(if i was paid and couldn't do my job i would be sacked, what makes you special)

George Osborne has brought our country to a stand still and represents the country We want him out
